Reviews.Title: Basic Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: L. Rossi
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a low price basic cell phone, this is a good choice. There are no bells or whistles, it is however, small, light weight and easy to use. For the most part I get good reception and the voice is clear. Cost less then $35.

Reviews.Title: The phone is locked and the battery is a used one!!!
Reviews.Author: Anatolii
Reviews.Content: The phone is locked although it says unlocked in the title. Also the battery isn't new, it's already used, it looks very old and is scratched all over.
